objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0a2342'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#084c61'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='#000814' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#2c7da0' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='50' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='70' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/><rect x='-200' y='300' width='2000' height='3' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05' transform='rotate(45, 540, 540)'/><rect x='-200' y='600' width='2000' height='2' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05' transform='rotate(45, 540, 540)'/><rect x='-200' y='900' width='2000' height='3' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05' transform='rotate(45, 540, 540)'/></svg>

objects.text:
Energy-Efficient Design
Multiple Wash Cycles
Large Capacity Drum
Intuitive Digital Controls

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Revolution
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• Large capacity front-loading drum for efficient washing
• Multiple wash cycles including Express, Delay, and Temperature control options
• Energy-efficient operation with digital LED display showing remaining time
• Customizable settings with easy-to-use selection dial
• Advanced washing technology with multiple water level options
• Durable construction with reinforced glass door and safety lock
• Digital control panel with clear cycle indicators
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for modern homes
• Anti-vibration system with stabilizing feet for quiet operation
• User-friendly interface with clear program descriptions
• Energy Star compliant for reduced power consumption
• Multiple temperature settings for various fabric types
• Contemporary aesthetic that complements any laundry space

banner_details:
This banner promotes a washing machine product with a modern tech-inspired design. It features a striking geometric background using layered diagonal shapes and subtle textures, including lines and circles to create depth. At the top left, the text layer `heading_1` and `heading_2` deliver a bold and futuristic title in uppercase white typography. Just below, the `subheading` in bright blue further highlights the product type. A concise bullet list of features is shown using the text layer `description`, aligned vertically. The price is prominently displayed in bold white in the text layer `price`, and a bright blue rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) appears at the bottom, catching attention. The product image (`product_image`) is placed on the right side and scaled down, ensuring focus on the washer.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#0a2342` (background)
- Ocean Blue: `#084c61` (gradient blend)
- Sky Blue: `#4CC9F0` (subheading and button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (text and product highlight)
- Deep Navy: `#000814` (call-to-action text)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern washing machine with a predominantly minimalist white exterior, accented by bold black and dark gray elements. The stark contrast creates a clean, professional look. The white body (#FFFFFF) serves as the base tone, conveying purity and modernity. The black door ring (#1A1A1A) introduces depth and draws visual focus to the central drum area. The metallic knob and handle areas have shades of silver-gray (#C0C0C0), giving a sense of sophistication. The digital display incorporates neon blue (#00BFFF) highlights, making key functions pop subtly yet clearly. This palette works well for a tech-savvy, premium banner design.
